data.title: Golden Globe Nominees 2019: Full List And Projected Winners
data.meta_description: As nominees and viewers gear up for the Golden Globes this Sunday, the online gambling community has already picked its winners.
data.text:
As nominees and viewers gear up for the Golden Globes this Sunday, the online gambling community has already picked its winners.

According to wagers placed by internet bettors, musical drama A Star Is Born is the odds-on favorite to win Best Picture in the Drama category. In the Musical or Comedy category, it's a toss-up between period drama The Favourite and Dick Cheney history Vice. Behind the camera, Roma's Alfonso Cuaron is the out-and-out favorite to win Best Director.

In the performance categories, Bradley Cooper is predicted to win for Best Actor in A Star Is Born while his co-star Lady Gaga is expected to take home the award in the actress category.

On the small screen, Killing Eve, The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel and The Assassination of Gianni Versace: American Crime Story are top picks across categories.

The 76th Annual Golden Globe Awards ceremony will air on NBC on Sunday, January 6. Read on to see the full list of nominees below, with odds-on favorites for each category in bold.

MOVIES

Best Supporting Actress in a Motion Picture

Amy Adams, Vice

Claire Foy, First Man

Regina King, If Beale Street Could Talk

Emma Stone, The Favourite

Rachel Weisz, The Favourite
